legal_basis: tripartite test for granting an interlocutory injunction
procedural_fairness: alleged lack of independence and impartiality
decision_reasoning: serious issue found, irreparable harm and balance of convenience not met due to speculative evidence and public interest impact
application_details: Nalliah argued PRRA Officers lacked independence during CBSA time
result_of_case: notice procedures established for potential class members
cause_of_action: prevent removals based on allegedly biased PRRA decisions
procedure_followed: Federal Court applied tripartite test for injunctive relief
